definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: The neo-Archean rocks possibly exist in Tieklik metamorphic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 铁克力克可能有新太古代变质岩系的存在。

sentences.english: The Precambrian metamorphic rocks in Northern Fujian are the important part consisting of the Cathaysian palaeocontinental basement.
sentences.chinese: 闻北前寒武纪变质岩是华夏古陆基底的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Apart from these young Danxia landforms, a variety of metamorphic rocks can also be viewed at the source of the Laodao River.
sentences.chinese: 捞刀河源头区除了这年轻的丹霞，还有各种变质岩。

sentences.english: The metamorphic petrology of eclogites from northern Dabie Mountains was performed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了大别山北部榴辉岩的变质岩岩石学。

sentences.english: It can therefore, be deduced that the protolith from which sapphirine was derived is not necessarily magnesiorich pelite.
sentences.chinese: 含假蓝宝石的变质岩石之原岩未必是富镁泥质岩。

sentences.english: All the gems that have been discovered occur in the hypometamorphic rock belts.
sentences.chinese: 已发现的宝玉石均产于深变质岩带中。

sentences.english: Marble, a metamorphic rock, forms when limestone re- crystallizes.
sentences.chinese: 大理岩，一种变质岩，在灰岩重结晶时形成。

sentences.english: Wangjiawaizi gold deposit occurs in Lower Proterozoic opimetamorphic rock series.
sentences.chinese: 王家崴子金矿床赋存于辽南古元古代浅变质岩系中。

sentences.english: Is the tectonic setting of South Anhui metamorphic rocks an ancient land or an orogen?
sentences.chinese: 皖南变质岩分布区是古陆还是一个造山带？

sentences.english: The host rocks of the ore bodies, the Gaixian Formation of Liaohe Group, are a medium grade metamorphosed rock of the Early Proterogoic.
sentences.chinese: 矿体围岩为早元古界辽河群盖县组中部变质岩系。

sentences.english: Almost all kinds of metamorphic rocks can be discovered here.
sentences.chinese: 变质岩几乎所有类型的小构造，在这里都找得到。

sentences.english: Wangjiawaizi gold deposit occurrs in Lower Proterozoic opimetamorphic rock series.
sentences.chinese: 王家崴子金矿床赋存于辽南古元古代浅变质岩系中。

sentences.english: This precious mineral is found as crystals within metamorphic rock.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在变质岩中发现这种珍贵矿物的结晶体。

sentences.english: Basement of the basins is composed of Uranium-bearing granite and high-and medium-grade metamorphic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 盆地基底为花岗岩和中高级变质岩，铀源条件良好。

sentences.english: Precambrian metamorphic rocks constituted the basin basement.
sentences.chinese: 盆地的基底是前寒武系变质岩。

sentences.english: The oldest metamorphic rock and the youngest Danxia landscapes coexist.
sentences.chinese: 这里，湖南最老的变质岩和最年青的丹霞共存。

definition: rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)
